meanings.definition: In a manner showing disbelief or skepticism.
meanings.sent1: She looked at the magician's trick incredulously.
meanings.sent2: He shook his head incredulously at the outrageous claim.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog made her stare incredulously.
meanings.sent4: The idea of time travel left her incredulously puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The UFO sighting was met with incredulously raised eyebrows.

meanings.sent1: He raised an eyebrow incredulously at the suggestion.
meanings.sent2: She listened incredulously to the unbelievable story.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed incredulously at the empty food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The old clock ticked incredulously slow.
meanings.sent5: The student stared incredulously at the difficult math problem.
